alert.note: Alert for Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Russell County through 445 AM CDT... At 400 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pfeifer, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Russell, Gorham, Milberger, and Russell Airport. This includes Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 175 and 188. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
